data.title: Rubicon
data.text:
The assessment procedure and the management of projects awarded funding under the Rubicon programme has been delegated to the following NWO domains: Science (ENW), Social Sciences and Humanities (SGW), Applied and Engineering Sciences (TTW) and Health Research and Development (ZonMw). During the evaluation process each domain is supported by a committee made up of researchers from the relevant disciplines. Below is a list of people who have been on the evaluation committees of Rubicon.

Assessment committee
